title: Hatsunetsu Libido
sinopse:
Included one-shots:
Volume 1: Kiss kara Mekurumeku Junjou, Senpai nanka, Daikirai.
Volume 2: Kimi wa Yasashii Kemono, Kono Koi, Sono Kuchibiru kara
Volume 3: Hidaka-kun to Kiss shitai
Volume 4: Himitsu ni Shitai, Shitakunai.
Volume 5: Kimi to Tomodachi wo Yameru Toki
